overview_of_class: This course is an introduction to the Alexander Technique, which is a method of learning to reduce stress and become more efficient in your everyday life. You will learn ways to apply the principles of the Alexander Technique to your practicing and performance. You can find a detailed description of the Alexander Technique at: www.amsatonline.org and www.alexandertechnique.co.uk
name: Alexander Technique
subject: MUSIC

This new thee quarter course is an expanded study of the Alexander Technique including an introduction during the first quarter. The goal of this three quarter commitment is to gain a reliable facility in the application of the Alexander Technique.

subject: MUSIC
